title: Resources and Materials
intro: Explore our free resources to help your business make the most of Interflow and improve your customer service.

guides.title: Guides and Tutorials
guides.description: Learn how to use Interflow with our step-by-step guides and detailed tutorials.

resources.title: Interflow Getting Started Guide
resources.description: Learn the fundamentals of Interflow and how to set up your account in less than an hour.

resources.title: Setting Up Service Channels
resources.description: Complete tutorial on how to integrate WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram and other channels.

resources.title: Creating Automated Flows
resources.description: Learn how to create automated conversation flows to serve your customers 24/7.

templates.title: Templates and Scripts
templates.description: Save time with our ready-to-use templates for different service scenarios.

resources.title: WhatsApp Message Templates
resources.description: 20 WhatsApp-approved templates for different industries and situations.

resources.title: Customer Service Scripts
resources.description: Professional scripts to handle inquiries, complaints, and common situations.

resources.title: Pre-configured Sales Flows
resources.description: Accelerate your sales process with ready-made flows for qualification and negotiation.

webinars.title: Webinars and Videos
webinars.description: Watch our webinars and instructional videos to enhance your skills.

resources.title: How to Increase Sales with Automation
resources.description: Webinar with experts on how to use automation to boost conversions.

resources.title: Best Practices in Omnichannel Service
resources.description: Learn strategies to provide a consistent experience across all channels.

resources.title: Interflow in Practice: Complete Demo
resources.description: Complete demonstration of all Interflow features in a real case.

ebooks.title: E-books and PDF Guides
ebooks.description: Complete materials for download and offline reference.

resources.title: The Definitive Guide to Digital Customer Service
resources.description: Complete e-book with strategies, techniques, and metrics for excellent digital service.

resources.title: CRM in the Digital Age: Strategies That Work
resources.description: Practical guide on how to implement modern and effective CRM strategies.

resources.title: Customer Service ROI: How to Measure and Improve
resources.description: Learn how to calculate the return on investment of your service and optimize results.
